title: Inter-Organizational Learning: Knowledge Sharing and Collaboration Strategies Through Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational theory and collaboration concepts
context.additional_context: A course analyzing interorganizational learning processes centered on maritime industry cases, exploring digital technology adoption and service-oriented strategy development.

learning_goals: Learners can explain key mechanisms of interorganizational knowledge sharing (individual/group/organizational levels).
Learners can analyze causes of bidirectional learning gaps at the strategic motivation level through case studies.
Learners can design and evaluate interorganizational collaboration models in digital transformation contexts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
